badge.name: Certified Security Expert
badge.description: Software developer with 15 years of experience. Broad and deep foundation in algorithms, mathematics, distributed systems, and scalability. My B.S is in Mathematics, and my M.S. is in Applied Mathematics (focus on Numerical Analysis) and Computer Science.

issuer.name: Learning Machine
issuer.description: Learning Machine partners with governments, companies, and school systems to deploy secure credentialing systems that leverage the blockchain as a secure anchor of trust. To ensure the longevity and interoperability of these records, we are ongoing contributors to standards communities, including Blockcerts, IMS Global, and the W3C.

displayHtml:
Brandon Sanders, PhD.
CERTIFIED SECURITY EXPERT & SYSTEM DESIGNER
Software developer with 15 years of experience. Broad foundation in algorithms, mathematics, distributed systems, and scalability. Certification renewed by Federation of CompSci based in Washington D.C on December 2017.
This sample certificate is for educational purposes only.
